MobileStereoNet requires 98% and 72% fewer parame-
ters compared to AutoDispNet-CSS and GwcNet-g, respec-
tively.
Table 7: Comparison of model size. Our two proposed methods yield more compact models compared to other works.

replacing other components with v 2 block (t = 2).

Table 2: Performance evaluation for the selected variant of 3D baseline (FE 2D :v 1 , HG 3D :v 2 ) from Tab. 3b of the paper, when 
replacing other components with v 2 block (t = 2).
